Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Package
org.cougaar.core.relay

Packages that use org.cougaar.core.relay
org.cougaar.core.adaptivity This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.plugin.freeze   
org.cougaar.core.qos.ca Coordination Artifacts are designed to separate out an abstract communication pattern, on the one hand, and the domain-specific clients of the communication on the other. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.multicast.rir This collection of classes provides the base implementation for a multicast query/response coordination using receiver-initiated-registration. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.oneway   
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.selectserver   
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.sweep.bundled   
org.cougaar.core.relay This package contains the Cougaar support for "relays", which are generic blackboard objects that transfer data between agents. 
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.completion   
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.relay used by org.cougaar.core.adaptivity
Relay
          A Relay is a blackboard object that allows a source agent to stream content changes to multiple target agents, and for each target to stream back a response.
Relay.Source
          The source-side Relay, which contains the content and a set of target-addresses, and also receives response updates from the Target(s).
Relay.Target
          The target-side Relay, which receives content updates and can send response updates back to the Source.
Relay.TargetFactory
          A factory for creating a Target from the Source's content.
Relay.Token
          An object that is passed from the Source to the Target(s), which authorizes content updates.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.relay used by org.cougaar.core.blackboard
Relay
          A Relay is a blackboard object that allows a source agent to stream content changes to multiple target agents, and for each target to stream back a response.
Relay.Source
          The source-side Relay, which contains the content and a set of target-addresses, and also receives response updates from the Target(s).
Relay.Target
          The target-side Relay, which receives content updates and can send response updates back to the Source.
Relay.TargetFactory
          A factory for creating a Target from the Source's content.
Relay.Token
          An object that is passed from the Source to the Target(s), which authorizes content updates.
SimpleRelay
          A blackboard object API to send a query object to a remote agent, which can optionally reply back to the sender.

Classes in org.cougaar.core.relay used by org.cougaar.core.relay
Relay
          A Relay is a blackboard object that allows a source agent to stream content changes to multiple target agents, and for each target to stream back a response.
Relay.Source
          The source-side Relay, which contains the content and a set of target-addresses, and also receives response updates from the Target(s).
Relay.Target
          The target-side Relay, which receives content updates and can send response updates back to the Source.
Relay.TargetFactory
          A factory for creating a Target from the Source's content.
Relay.Token
          An object that is passed from the Source to the Target(s), which authorizes content updates.
RelayDirective
          A Directive for relay messages, which can add/change/remove a Relay.Target and send responses back to the Relay.Source.
SimpleRelay
          A blackboard object API to send a query object to a remote agent, which can optionally reply back to the sender.
SimpleRelayBase
          Abstract base class for SimpleRelay implementations.
